gyrokinetics.documentation:
Description of a gyrokinetic simulation (delta-f, flux-tube). All quantities within this IDS are normalised (apart from time), thus independent of rhostar, consistently with the local approximation and
a spectral representation is assumed in the perpendicular plane (i.e. homogeneous turbulence). All quantities are given in the laboratory frame, except the moments of the perturbed distribution function which are given in the rotating frame.

gyrokinetics.code.documentation: Generic decription of the code-specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

gyrokinetics.code.output_flag.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

gyrokinetics.code.parameters.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

gyrokinetics.collisions.collisionality_n.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "collisionality_norm"

Index in the error_description list for "b_field_tor_sign"

Index in the error_description list for "magnetic_shear_r_minor"

gyrokinetics.flux_surface.r_minor_norm.documentation: Normalised minor radius of the flux surface of interest = 1/2 * (max(R) - min(R))/L_ref

gyrokinetics.fluxes_integrated_norm.documentation: Normalised fluxes integrated over the kx and ky grids used in a non-linear run (therefore they have no dependence on the wavevector) in the laboratory frame, for a given species

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.comment.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.creation_dat.documentation: Date at which this data has been produced

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.homogeneous_.documentation: This node must be filled (with 0 or 1) for the IDS to be valid. If 1, the time of this IDS is homogeneous, i.e. the time values for this IDS are stored in the time node just below the root of this IDS. If 0, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree. In the case only constant or static nodes are filled within the IDS, this node must still be filled, and set to 1 (by convention).

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.provider.documentation: Name of the person in charge of producing this data

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.source.documentation: Source of the data (any comment describing the origin of the data : code, path to diagnostic signals, processing method, ...)

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.version_put.documentation: Version of the access layer package used to PUT this IDS

gyrokinetics.ids_properties.version_put..documentation: Version of Access Layer used to PUT this IDS
Programming language of the Access Layer high level API used to PUT this IDS
Version of Data Dictionary used to PUT this IDS

gyrokinetics.model.collisions_energy_con.documentation: Flag = 1 if the collision operator conserves energy, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.collisions_finite_lar.documentation: Flag = 1 if finite larmor radius effects are retained in the collision operator, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.collisions_momentum_c.documentation: Flag = 1 if the collision operator conserves momentum, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.collisions_pitch_only.documentation: Flag = 1 if only pitch-angle scattering is retained, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.include_a_field_paral.documentation: Flag = 1 if fluctuations of the parallel vector potential are retained, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.include_b_field_paral.documentation: Flag = 1 if fluctuations of the parallel magnetic field are retained, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.include_centrifugal_e.documentation: Flag = 1 if centrifugal effects are retained, 0 otherwise

gyrokinetics.model.include_full_curvatur.documentation: Flag = 1 if all contributions to the curvature drift are included (including beta_prime), 0 otherwise. Neglecting the beta_prime contribution (Flag=0) is only recommended together with the neglect of parallel magnetic field fluctuations

gyrokinetics.model.initial_value_run.documentation: Flag = 1 if this is an initial value run, 0 for an eigenvalue run

gyrokinetics.model.non_linear_run.documentation: Flag = 1 if this is a non-linear run, 0 for a linear run

gyrokinetics.model.time_interval_norm.documentation: Normalised time interval used to average fluxes and moments from non-linear runs

gyrokinetics.model.time_interval_norm_er.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "time_interval_norm"

gyrokinetics.species.documentation: Set of species (including electrons) used in the calculation and related quantities

gyrokinetics.species[:].charge_norm_erro.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "charge_norm"

gyrokinetics.species[:].density_log_grad.documentation: Normalised logarithmic gradient (with respect to r_minor_norm) of the density
Index in the error_description list for "density_log_gradient_norm"

gyrokinetics.species[:].density_norm_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "density_norm"

gyrokinetics.species[:].mass_norm_error_.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "mass_norm"

gyrokinetics.species[:].temperature_log_.documentation: Normalised logarithmic gradient (with respect to r_minor_norm) of the temperature
Index in the error_description list for "temperature_log_gradient_norm"

gyrokinetics.species[:].temperature_norm.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "temperature_norm"

gyrokinetics.species[:].velocity_tor_gra.documentation: Normalised gradient (with respect to r_minor_norm) of the toroidal velocity
Index in the error_description list for "velocity_tor_gradient_norm"

gyrokinetics.species_all.documentation: Physical quantities common to all species

gyrokinetics.species_all.beta_reference.documentation: Reference plasma beta (see detailed documentation at the root of the IDS)

gyrokinetics.species_all.beta_reference_.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "beta_reference"

gyrokinetics.species_all.debye_length_re.documentation: Debye length computed from the reference quantities (see detailed documentation at the root of the IDS)
Index in the error_description list for "debye_length_reference"

gyrokinetics.species_all.shearing_rate_n.documentation: Normalised ExB shearing rate (for non-linear runs only)
Index in the error_description list for "shearing_rate_norm"

gyrokinetics.species_all.velocity_tor_no.documentation: Normalised toroidal velocity of species (all species are assumed to have a purely toroidal velocity with a common toroidal angular frequency)
Index in the error_description list for "velocity_tor_norm"

gyrokinetics.species_all.zeff_error_inde.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "zeff"
